description:
Fixed up some bass hanging notes.
(via editor)
title: Symptom of the Universe

description: Removed the stupid and unnecssesairiy e standard tracks
title: Symptom of the Universe

description: Some minor drum alterations for improved sound. I Replaced some of the crash cymbals to open hi-hat because the open hi-hat sounds better & the previous constant crash cymbals were way too loud and dominating over the snare.  I also removed the annoying & loud cabasa ticking noises from the final part of the drums when the acoustic guitar part is playing.
title: Symptom of the Universe

description:
- Added tracks for guitar and bass in C# standard, as the song was apparently recorded with that tuning. Kept the E standard tuned tracks because it's still possible to play the song note for note in E standard. C# tracks have the riffs at 119 and 193 in different positions, which should be how Tony originally seems to play them live.
- Simplified the main riff so the power chord doesn't gradually remove notes.
- Added palm mutes to the section at 191 and fixed a note in the riff at 193.
- Corrections to bass track
- Corrected some lyrics and aligned them with the vocal track properly
- Put the solo in its own track and put the rhythm part during the solo in the rhythm track
- Added swing to 191 - 216
- Minor changes to the lead and vocal tracks
- Put the acoustic part that was in the previous overdub distortion track into its own nylon acoustic track
- Added chord names
title: Symptom of the Universe

description: changed bpm slightly, changed a few parts with the bass.
title: Symptom of the Universe

description: Removed annoying palm mute text and changed the solo so it should stay in the same position throughout most of it.
title: Symptom of the Universe

description: Added lyrics & sections; added actual palm mutes, not just text.
title: Symptom of the Universe
